abstract: Family members of people killed and injured by James E Holmes in Aurora, Colo, movie theater in 2012 give emotional testimony in court; relate heart-wrenching accounts of the depression and loss they experienced following the massacre.
lead_paragraph: James E. Holmes was sentenced to life in prison in August, but this week’s hearings focus on the other nonlethal crimes for which he was also charged.

headline.main: Loved Ones Recount Their Pain at Hearing for Aurora Gunman
headline.print_headline: Loved Ones Recount Their Pain at Hearing for Colorado Gunman
